name: lionsgateplay
description: LionsGatePlay project to run WebdriverIO tests with Web and Appium to test native applications on iOS and Android

scripts.android: npm run killPort && npm run clean && wdio run ./config/wdio.android.ts
scripts.bstack_android: npm run killPort && npm run clean && wdio run ./config/wdio.bstack_android.ts
scripts.clean: rimraf mochawesome-report/ && rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && rimraf _results_
scripts.api: npm run clean && mocha --recursive test/api/api-tests/*.ts --timeout 10000 --reporter mochawesome
scripts.report: allure generate --clean && allure serve allure-results && allure serve _results_
